channel.title: Online/offline
channel.description: Mk,I have noticed that some servers have npc's saying wether the owner is online or not.How do i spawn them and make them stay there after the server goes offline and say wether im online or not?

item.title: Online/offline
item.dc:creator: @barragey0uXD barragey0uXD
item.description:
@barragey0uXD wrote:

Go to npchandler, search for moo, then copy that whole code until the last bracket, then paste it, then change npc id to the npc you want, then add under the last bracket:

else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2262) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if(PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("B02")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "B02 is online w00t!"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "B02 is offline, aww."; }
As you see i used my username, you can change B02 to your own name.
To spawn the npc go to autospawn.cfg and you’ll easily see how to spawn them.

Read full topic
